subject: Re: [junit] Testing JSP & Struts
msgSnippet: Cactus (formerlry J2EEUnit) and HttpUnit. Depends on the level I am testing on. (Cactus for Unit Tests and HttpUnit for functionality tests) Toyin ... From:
messageBody:
Cactus (formerlry J2EEUnit) and HttpUnit. Depends on the level I am testing
on. (Cactus for Unit Tests and HttpUnit for functionality tests)

Toyin

----- Original Message -----
From: <jrender@...>

Sent: Thursday, May 17, 2001 1:36 PM
Subject: [junit] Testing JSP & Struts


> hi,
>
> I've been using JUnit for a while though just on my java business classes.
> I'm just moving from writing servlets to using the Apache Struts framework
> along with JSP.
>

> what are you people out there using for JSP & Struts.

> thanks
